usage.app-icon.png: Displayed in app header and favicon placeholder. 512x512 recommended.
usage.share-wide.png: OpenGraph image for Facebook, X, WhatsApp, LinkedIn.
usage.facebook.png: Share button icon for Facebook Posts (vector preferred).
usage.instagram.png: Share icon for IG Story/Post (vector preferred).

notes: All assets referenced directly in HTML must be placed under /assets.
Cloudflare Pages requires correct case sensitivity for paths.
For AdSense compliance, avoid using religious imagery tied to specific sects.
Vidya character assets are optional and not tied to core functionality.
